      • vFind

        public int vFind(int dir)
        Search defined key word with specified direction
        Parameters:
        dir - Search direction. If dir < 0, search backward; if dir >= 0, search forward
         
        Returns:
        A int value indicates search result. 0: succeeded; -1: failed; 1: need thread operation

        initiate keyword and search options for document inner text searching

        match_case - If the searching should match case with the key word

      • vGetLock

        public int vGetLock()
        *Get current page sliding lock mode
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        An int value which indicates the page sliding lock mode. 0: no lock; 1: lock horizontal moving; 2: lock vertical moving; 3: lock moving and zooming

      • vGetPos

        public virtual PDFPos vGetPos( float vx, float vy )
        Get current position data with specified shift x and y coordinates. Set both values to 0 to get top-left corner
        Parameters:
        vx - x offset
        vy - y offset
        Returns:
        A PDFPos instance refer to the position

      • vOpen

        public virtual void vOpen(
PDFDoc doc,
int page_gap,
uint back_color,
PDFViewListener listener
)
        Open a PDF document and render it
        Parameters:
        doc - A PDFDoc instance which refers to the PDF document
        page_gap - gap between pages
        back_color - background color
        listener - A implementation of PDFViewListener to deal with PDF reading and user interaction events, including view loaded, page changed, page single tapped, etc.
        Returns:

      • PDFV_STATUS

        public enum PDFV_STATUS
        STA_NONE = 0,
        STA_ZOOM = 1,
        STA_SELECT = 2,
        STA_ANNOT = 3,
        STA_NOTE = 4,
        STA_INK = 5,
        STA_RECT = 6,
        STA_ELLIPSE = 7,
        STA_LINE = 8,
